entry.title: Wild Creek Naturals - Filled Display
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Creek Naturals
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 220.00

NEW at Soul Scents ! Made by Wild Creek Naturals in Salmo BC these 4 products are a great addition to any store.

Display Includes: 8 Essential Oils, 8 Traditional Remedy Balm, 8 Hand Sanitizer & 4 Junglista Outdoor Spray. Testers included for each & measures 8" wide x 11" tall x 8" deep. If displays are not in stock delivery to store will take 2 weeks.

entry.title: Nova Scotia Fisherman Baby Products

Vendor: Nova Scotia Fisherman

NEW From Nova Scotia Fisherman .. Beautiful Baby Products made with their trademark Nova Scotia Sea Kelp with hints of Lavender & Chamomile. 

Baby Balm & Baby Soap with no artificial fragrance, dyes or preservatives & no petroleum based ingredients.

entry.title: Nova Scotia Fisherman Pet Products
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nova Scotia Fisherman
Type: All-Natural Bodycare
Price: 5.45 - 8.95 (2 variants)

NEW from Nova Scotia Fisherman ... Soap & Salve for your four legged friend. 

Bar Soap designed for dogs will help with hot spots, condition their skin & is made with essential oils that help to deter fleas & ticks.

Pet Salve is based on their Rescue Balm formula and is great for rough paws, cuts, scrapes or scratches.

entry.title: Papier d'Armenie
entry.summary:
Vendor: Papier d'Armenie
Type: Incense
Price: 4.00 - 20.00 (4 variants)

Known worldwide as the most ancient natural room deodorizer; since 1885.

 Made from natural ingredients such as benzoin and incense.

Created to perfume your home and eliminate unpleasant odors such as frying, tobacco, cat litter, bathroom or dampness. Bring it with you on your travels : car, vacation home, hotel room.

The absorbent paper used to manufacture Papier d’Arménie® is certified by the Forest Stewardship Council, an independent international organisation to promote the responsible management of the world's forests.

Papier d’Arménie can also be used without burning it to deodorize wardrobes or drawers. Each booklet has 36 pre-cut paper strips, in twelve sheets of 3.

Ceramic holder comes in assorted colours. It has a triangular base with sides of 14.5cm & Dome 8cm in diameter.

entry.title: Badger After Sun Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Badger Balms
Type: All-Natural Bodycare
Price: 9.75

Soothing After-Sun Skin Care. Badger's all-natural and organic After Sun Balm is Packed with soothing Cocoa and Shea Butters, and makes a great addition to any sun care routine. Sun, wind, salt, and sand all take a toll on skin, and After Sun Balm helps to restore the balance. Lavender and Moroccan Blue Tansy oils contribute to the delightful tropical scent and have been shown to exhibit anti-inflammatory properties, helping to soothe, cool, and relieve your dry, tight skin after sun exposure

Type: All-Natural Bodycare
Price: 9.75

NEW from Badger! A Shampoo Bar that lasts as long as a 12oz bottle of shampoo. Made with 85% organic ingredients this bar is easy to travel with, perfect for both hair and body, plant based, vegan & cruelty free.

entry.title: Badger Tattoo Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Badger Balms
Type: All-Natural Bodycare
Price: 9.75

Got ink? Keep it conditioned and protected with our soothing and nourishing certified organic tattoo aftercare. Dry skin is the enemy of new or existing body art. Badger’s Tattoo Balm with moisturizing Coconut and Tamanu oil will help keep your skin soft and smooth and your ink bold and vibrant! Pure and gentle essential oils exude a subtle, natural aroma.

entry.title: The 5 Elements
entry.summary:
Vendor: Invocation
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 16.95

Travel to the heart of nature with one of these 5 scents from Invocation. Each scent evokes an element and promotes a balance based on its energy. Use them as a perfume or room spray. 

Sacred Sound promotes integration, synthesis & thoughtfulness.

Earth promotes openness, stability & balance.

Wind promotes inspiration, determination & courage.

Water promotes kindness, gentleness & confidence.

Fire promotes love, compassion & respect.

entry.title: Rare Essence Essential Oils
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rare Essence
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 5.25 - 23.25 (48 variants)

Rare Essence sources the finest Essential Oils from around the world, working as closely with the plant farmers and distillers as possible. These oils are extensively tested by an essential oil chemist and are pure, natural & undiluted unless stated. 

There are Single Note Oils and Blends to choose from. 

Displays are available in 1, 2, 3 or 4 tiers and are a perfect way to display this beautiful line. Each Tier must be purchased with 12 different oils (6 units of each) and testers are included. These units are custom ordered to your choice so please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery. Price will depend on the oils purchased to fill the tier, ask for details.

entry.title: Rare Essence Diffusers for Home & Car
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rare Essence
Type: Diffusers
Price: 4.00 - 53.00 (5 variants)

NEW! Lotus Diffuser from Rare Essence will passively diffuse this beautiful blend and requires no plug in to do so! Simply pour the essential oil into the base, place the lotus flower on top and it will begin to release the aroma into the air as it absorbs the essential oil blend.

entry.title: Rare Essence Perfumes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rare Essence
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 15.00

These beautiful roll-on perfumes are made from 100% essential oils in 100% organic jojoba oil. Hand blended in small batches by master perfumers, these perfumes have no irritating synthetics or manufactured fragrances. 

Each perfume is also enhanced with vibrational flower essences which work with your body's energy to influence emotional, physical & mental well-being.

Each Perfume is 10ml.

entry.title: Sidha Tulsi & Neem Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chandrika
Type: All-Natural Bodycare
Price: 1.60

Made from pure coconut oil with natural extracts of Tulsi and Neem. Tulsi (Holy Basil) and Neem are both naturally anti-bacterial and help to protect the skin against bacterial infections.

Sidha Soap does not contain any animal fat and is not tested on animals. Sidha Soap does not contain any artificial colour.

Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil & Vitamin E help to soothe and relieve dry, tight skin. Perfect after a shower or bath, or anytime extra pampering is needed. Hypoallergenic & suitable for all skin types, safe for use during and after pregnancy.

56gr/ 2oz tin
